name: grgn-stack
description: GRGN Stack: Go + React + GraphQL + Neo4j full-stack template

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend && cd web && npm run test -- --run
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:backend && npm run coverage:frontend
scripts.coverage:backend: go test -v -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out -o coverage.html
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.generate: npm run generate:backend && npm run generate:frontend
scripts.generate:backend: cd services/core/shared && go run github.com/99designs/gqlgen generate
scripts.db:reset: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd web && npm update
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf bin web/dist coverage.out coverage.html web/coverage
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
